name: Acolyte Emblem
description: An insignia dropped by an Acolyte of the Stalker.

languages.description: Ein Abzeichen, fallengelassen von einem Akolythen des Stalkers.
languages.name: Emblem: Akolyth

languages.description: Un insigne laissé par l'un des Acolytes du Stalker.
languages.name: Badge Acolyte

languages.description: Uno stemma fatto cadere da un Accolite dello Stalker.
languages.name: Emblema Accolite

languages.description: Una insignia soltada por un acólito de Stalker.
languages.name: Emblema del Acólito

languages.description: 一名追猎者的追随者所掉落的徽章。
languages.name: 追随者徽章

languages.description: Stalker の従者がドロップしたエンブレム。
languages.name: アコライトエンブレム

languages.description: Uma insígnia obtida de um Acólito do Stalker.
languages.name: Emblema: Acólito

languages.description: 一名 Stalker 的追隨者所掉落的徽章。
languages.name: 追隨者徽章

languages.description: เหรียญตราที่ผู้ช่วยเหลือของ Stalker ดรอปทิ้งเอาไว้
languages.name: ตราสัญลักษณ์: Acolyte
